title: James Comey Testifies, Says Trump Lied: A Closer Look | Desus & Mero
description:
Seth takes a closer look at former FBI Director James Comey's Senate testimony that President Trump lied about his reasons for firing him and the Republicans' defense of POTUS' actions.
Then, Viceland hosts of Desus & Mero, Desus Nice and The Kid Mero, chat about why Donald Trump is like your most unqualified co-worker and how unimpressed their families are by their growing fame.
After their interview, Desus and Mero continue the conversation backstage, where they reveal their origin story and experience making TV versus podcasting.
